all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Behold, he who has repented of his sins, the same is forgiven, and I, the Lord, remember them no more.
Doctrine and Covenants 58:42
Quote of the Day
"Holiness sets things apart for sacred purpose. But holiness also invites us to infuse daily living with the sacred."
Gerrit W. Gong | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
